Jimi Hendrix at the O2.description: The Jimi Hendrix Experience return for a one off showcase of their seminal albub 'Are you experienced?'

Royal Blood.description: The closing night show of Royal Blood's Typhoons album tour - guaranteed to be one to remember.

The Doors.description: Jim Morrisson is back from his extended trip to the other side, and better than ever.

Miles Davis.description: Davis returns to Edinburgh's Queen Hall with his legendary quintet for a night of jazz, improvisation and ambience.

Jools Holland.description: Holland returns to Edinburgh's Queen Hall with his legendary quintet for a night of jazz, improvisation and ambience.

The Arctic Monkeys.description: The Arctic Monkeys are back from his extended trip to the US, and are better than ever.

Motorhead.description: Whiskey and Distortion - You know what to expect from Motorhead. More of the same. BYOB.

Emancipator.description: Synthesizers, strobes and no air-conditioning. Don't wear your best trainers.

Metronomy.description: Hopefully they play their old stuff.

Johann Sebastian Bach.description: Guess who's back, back again - Johann's back from the dead.
